fullText:
Honored Foe

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, paladin
Benefit: When a creature marked by your divine challenge or divine sanction damages you, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier.


Update (11/23/2009)
Replace “When a creature marked by you” with “When a creature marked by your divine challenge or divine sanction.”

Published in Divine Power, page(s) 139.
name: Honored Foe
benefit: When a creature marked by your divine challenge or divine sanction damages you, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier.
